frame.name: Abounding_with
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Location</fen> is filled or covered with the <fen>Theme</fen>. The <fen>Location</fen> is realized as the External Argument, and the <fen>Theme</fen> either as PP complement headed by <ment>with</ment>, <ment>in</ment> or <ment>of</ment>.
NB: This frame does not include uses of adjectives like <ment>paved</ment> when they merely specify the Type of some location, as in "paved and unpaved roads".
<ex><fex name="Location">The waters of the bay</fex> <t>teemed</t> <fex name="Theme">with fish</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Location">The waters of the bay</fex> <m>were</m> <t>teeming</t> <fex name="Theme">with fish</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Location">The road</fex> <m>was</m> <fex name="Degree">completely</fex> <t>covered</t> <fex name="Theme">in mud</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Theme
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> covers or fills the <fen>Location</fen>. This FE most frequently occurs in a PP Complement headed by with or in.
<ex>The waters of the bay <t>teemed</t> <fex name="Theme">with fish</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Location</fen> is the object or area that the <fen>Theme</fen> fills or covers. This frame element generally occurs as the External Argument.<ex><fex name="Location">The walls</fex> <t>crawled</t> <fex name="Theme">with nanite surveillance probes</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Location">The picture frame</fex> <m>was</m> <fex name="Degree">thickly</fex> <t>coated</t> <fex name="Theme">with dust</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> of abundance with which the <fen>Theme</fen> covers or fills the <fen>Location</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Depictive</fen> describes the state of the <fen>Location</fen>.<ex> She had <fex name="Location">a closet</fex> <t>crammed</t> <fex name="Depictive">full of clothes</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The period of time during which the the Abounding_with event occurs.</def-root>
